case.title: Im going to give it a try~ BBW here - 25 (with u)
case.text: I am a 25 y/o single black BBW. I am looking for a SINGLE man to come and visit once or twice a month. I live in northern VA. Im not really looking for a relationship but if it turns into one I wouldn't mind. I am a family person and outside of working and school im home with the kids. Every once in a while I want to go on a mini vacation with a decent independent man who can keep my mind occupied for the short time that we are together. I don't care about race, as long as you have your own. (house and car) I am a very oral person so if you wanna get it you have to give it. I would like someone funny and outgoing. I like kissing and cuddling so if you don't please don't respond. I love 420 so please be a smoker, or at least know where I can get my own and don't mind if I blaze. I cant have anymore children so no worries there. Please be clean and disease free. I know this is getting long so ill end it by saying... NO MARRIED OR ATTACHED MEN!! Your pic for mine, even if your not my type. No hard feelings.
